entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Deep River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:54 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries at times heavy beginning near noon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this morning. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
